I am an Assistant Professor in the [Department of Economics at Ankara University](http://www.politics.ankara.edu.tr/iktisat/). 

I teach undergraduate econometrics and agricultural economics, as well as graduate research methods and causal inference.

My research focuses on agricultural and environmental economics using applied econometrics and causal inference methods.
